item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:5, topic:365248”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=461453.msg3375679#msg3375679 date=1287601634]

Use this

if (command.startsWith("ticket")) { if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)){ deleteItem(995, 1000000000); addItem(621, 1); sendMessage("You've made a ticket! Type ::gp to make it into cash again!"); } else { sendMessage("You don't have enough cash to make a ticket! Sorry."); }

That would cause 100 errors because of a missing closing curly brace.
[/quote]

I didin’t put the last bracket , because he has to know these things =/ , if you keep spoon-feeding them , they will start asking too many nooby questions , like how to change npc’s hp and stuff.[/quote]
If you’re gonna help, don’t give members erroneous code…

Read full topic

item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:4, topic:365248”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=461453.msg3375678#msg3375678 date=1287601569]
Use this

if (command.startsWith("ticket")) { if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)){ deleteItem(995, 1000000000); addItem(621, 1); sendMessage("You've made a ticket! Type ::gp to make it into cash again!"); } else { sendMessage("You don't have enough cash to make a ticket! Sorry."); }
[/quote]
That would cause 100 errors because of a missing closing curly brace.[/quote]

I didin’t put the last bracket , because he has to know these things =/ , if you keep spoon-feeding them , they will start asking too many nooby questions , like how to change npc’s hp and stuff.

item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ticket")) { if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000000)) { deleteItem(995, 1000000000); addItem(621, 1); sendMessage("You've made a ticket! Type ::gp to make it into cash again!"); } else { sendMessage("You don't have 1 billion GP!"); } }

Sorry for the bad conventions. :S
